body_html:
Try following command to freeze the graph. We are able to create .pb file for text_classification.py (uses estimator and input function) example in tensorflow using the same command:

python path_to/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph.py --input_graph ./log/graph.pbtxt --input_checkpoint ./log/model.ckpt-0 --output_graph ./log/frozen_model.pb --output_node_names=ENet/logits_to_softmax
body_text:
Try following command to freeze the graph. We are able to create .pb file for text_classification.py (uses estimator and input function) example in tensorflow using the same command:
python  path_to/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph.py --input_graph ./log/graph.pbtxt --input_checkpoint ./log/model.ckpt-0 --output_graph ./log/frozen_model.pb --output_node_names=ENet/logits_to_softmax
body:
Try following command to freeze the graph. We are able to create .pb file for text_classification.py (uses estimator and input function) example in tensorflow using the same command:

python  path_to/tensorflow/python/tools/freeze_graph.py --input_graph ./log/graph.pbtxt --input_checkpoint ./log/model.ckpt-0 --output_graph ./log/frozen_model.pb --output_node_names=ENet/logits_to_softmax
